name: If rate >=, skip next
description: If value from last process has an absolute change from previous time it was calculated higher or equal to the specified value, processlist execution will skip the next process.

name: If rate <, skip next
description: If value from last process has an absolute change from previous time it was calculated lower than the specified value, processlist execution will skip the next process.

name: If Mute, skip next
description: A time elapsed dependent condition, first time a processlist passes here the flow is unchanged. Next times the same processlist passes here, if the specified value time (in seconds) has not elapsed, flow will skip next process.

name: If !Mute, skip next
description: A time elapsed dependent condition, first time a processlist passes here the flow skips next. Next times the same processlist passes here, if the specified value time (in seconds) has elapsed, flow will skip next process.

name: Send Email
description:
Send an email to the user with the specified body. Email sent to user's email address or default set in config.

Supported template tags to customize body: {type}, {id}, {key}, {name}, {node}, {time}, {value}

Example body text: At {time} your {type} from {node} with key {key} named {name} had value {value}.
